page.title: 07HOME LIFE 2
page.content:
Children get up between 6_7a.m. have a cereal breakfast or toast in the kit_ chen where there's a washing machine fridge_freezer, wall_cupboards and perhaps a tumble drier.At 8.30 they leave for school & on arrival play in the playground.They study different subjects _ Mathematics, English, Sport History, Geography, Art & Science.They have 3 breaks, mid_morning,lunch & mid afternoon.For lunch sandwiches or hot meals are served from the cafeteria.
Schools finish at about 3.30 after which clubs are organised, such as History, sport or music.Guides, Scouts & swimming are popular evening activities.Otherwise they ride bicycles in quiet roads or perhaps play indoors with a friend.Most people have dinner around 6.00p.m. before going to bed between 9_9.30p.m.
